item.title: Comparison of Deep Reinforcement Learning Algorithms for Learning Control Policies for Physics-based Locomotion Tasks
item.description: Comparison of various state-of-art reinforcement learning algorithms

item.title: [Paper Presentation] SIMBICON and GENBICON: Physics Based Control Models for Locomotion
item.description: I present the two seminal models of physics-based walking, called SIMBICON and GENBICON. The course instructor KangKang Yin is the inventor of SIMBICON.
